snippet: Molson Coors is buying StarBev, which brews more than 20 brands in countries including the Czech Republic, Serbia, Croatia and Romania, for 2.65 billion euros from the private equity firm CVC Capital Partners and StarBev management.
abstract: Molson Coors is buying StarBev, which brews more than 20 brands in countries including the Czech Republic, Serbia, Croatia and Romania, for 2.65 billion euros from the private equity firm CVC Capital Partners and StarBev management.

byline.original: By JULIA WERDIGIER and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Bent on Expansion, Molson to Buy StarBev of Europe
